Class TetrisGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisGame

  • public class TetrisGame
extends java.lang.Object
    The TetrisGame creates an object of Tetris Board and links methods from TetrisBoard to TetrisController

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ccw
      int for counter clockwise
